trans-unit.source: Displays an image on a mobile Web page.
trans-unit.target: 在行動網頁上顯示影像。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱<see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站</see> (機器翻譯)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Image> class provides a way to choose an image file based on device characteristics.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Image>類別會提供方法來選擇裝置特性為基礎的映像檔。

trans-unit.source: For certain devices, you can specify built-in images by using a `symbol` : prefix as part of the URL in the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Image.ImageUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 針對特定裝置，您可以指定內建的映像使用`symbol`： 一部分中的 URL 前置詞<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Image.ImageUrl%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the Device-Specific section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Image>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱裝置的特定區段<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Image>。

trans-unit.source: If your application relies on cookieless sessions, or might receive requests from browsers that require cookieless sessions, using a tilde ("~") in a path can inadvertently result in creating a new session and potentially losing session data.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的應用程式依賴無 cookie 工作階段，或可能會收到要求從瀏覽器需要無 cookie 工作階段，使用波狀符號 ("~ 」) 之路徑中可能不小心會導致建立新的工作階段，可能遺失工作階段資料。

trans-unit.source: To set a property with a path such as ("~/path"), resolve the path using <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.ResolveUrl%2A>("~/path") before assigning it to the property.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定路徑的屬性，例如 ("~ / 路徑 」)，解析路徑使用<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.ResolveUrl%2A>("~ / 路徑 」) 之前指派給屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code sample code shows how to use a [\<DeviceSpecific>](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6dca8eb9-d6f6-479a-abac-20fc9d485cc8) control within an Image control to specify different images for different devices.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例程式碼示範如何使用[ \<DeviceSpecific >](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6dca8eb9-d6f6-479a-abac-20fc9d485cc8)影像控制項來指定不同的映像不同裝置內的控制項。

trans-unit.source: If you have available a file named Sunshine.gif, it will appear in Internet Explorer.
trans-unit.target: 如果您擁有足夠的檔案，名為 Sunshine.gif，它會出現在 Internet Explorer。

trans-unit.source: If you view the page on a WML device such as an OpenWave phone or a CHTML device, it will appear as a sun icon.
trans-unit.target: 如果您在 WML 裝置，例如 OpenWave 電話或 CHTML 裝置上檢視頁面，將會顯示為 sun 圖示。

trans-unit.source: The page also displays the name of the browser and the resolved name of the image.
trans-unit.target: 瀏覽器的名稱和映像的解析的名稱，也會顯示頁面。

trans-unit.source: The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。

trans-unit.source: This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension.
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。

trans-unit.source: The following is the `<deviceFilters>` section of the `Web.config` file.
trans-unit.target: 以下是`<deviceFilters>`區段`Web.config`檔案。

trans-unit.source: for operating in a hosted environment.
trans-unit.target: 用於裝載環境中的作業。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求值：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />，權限值：<see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Image" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Image" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alternate text to display when an image is not available for the device.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定當影像無法供裝置使用時要顯示的替代文字。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱<see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站</see> (機器翻譯)。

trans-unit.source: The alternate text to display when an image is not available for the device.
trans-unit.target: 當影像無法供裝置使用時要顯示的替代文字。

trans-unit.source: The alternate text appears in browsers that do not support images or where the image file is not available.
trans-unit.target: 替代文字會出現在瀏覽器不支援映像或其中的影像檔無法使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL of the image source for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Image" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Image" /> 控制項之影像來源的 URL。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱<see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站</see> (機器翻譯)。

trans-unit.source: The URL of the image source for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Image" />
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Image" /> 控制項之影像來源的 URL。

trans-unit.source: Because various devices provide a set of built-in pictures, such as images for a heart, sunshine, a book, a right arrow, and so on, by using a [\<DeviceSpecific>](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6dca8eb9-d6f6-479a-abac-20fc9d485cc8) control within the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Image> control, you can provide a wide variety of graphics that can be integrated into the devices themselves, as well as standard Web graphics.
trans-unit.target: 因為在各種裝置透過使用提供的內建的圖片，例如核心、 陽光、 書籍，向右箭號和等等，一組[ \<DeviceSpecific >](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6dca8eb9-d6f6-479a-abac-20fc9d485cc8)內控制<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Image>控制項，您可以提供各種不同的圖形，可以整合到裝置本身，以及標準的 Web 圖形。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify `symbol:63726` as the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Image.ImageUrl%2A> property value for all devices that require WML markup, and Sunshine.gif as the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Image.ImageUrl%2A> property value for HTML devices.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以指定`symbol:63726`做為<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Image.ImageUrl%2A>屬性值，所有需要的裝置 WML 標記，並為 Sunshine.gif <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Image.ImageUrl%2A> HTML 裝置的屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The exact resolution of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Image.ImageUrl%2A> value is provided by an image adapter (such as <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ChtmlImageAdapter>, <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlImageAdapter>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlImageAdapter>).
trans-unit.target: 確切的解析度<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Image.ImageUrl%2A>映像配接器所提供值 (例如<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ChtmlImageAdapter>， <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlImageAdapter>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlImageAdapter>)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use a `<DeviceSpecific>` control within an <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Image> control to specify different images for different devices.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用`<DeviceSpecific>`內控制<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Image>控制項以指定不同的影像，為不同的裝置。

trans-unit.source: If a file named Sunshine.gif is available, it will appear in Internet Explorer.
trans-unit.target: 如果名為 Sunshine.gif 功能，它會出現在 Internet Explorer。

trans-unit.source: If you view the page on a WML device such as an OpenWave phone or a CHTML device, it will appear as a sun icon.
trans-unit.target: 如果您在 WML 裝置，例如 OpenWave 電話或 CHTML 裝置上檢視頁面，將會顯示為 sun 圖示。

trans-unit.source: The page also displays the name of the browser and the resolved name of the image.
trans-unit.target: 瀏覽器的名稱和映像的解析的名稱，也會顯示頁面。

trans-unit.source: The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。

trans-unit.source: This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension.
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。

trans-unit.source: The following is the `<deviceFilters>` section of the Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: 以下是`<deviceFilters>`Web.config 檔案區段。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the target URL of the image.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定影像的目標 URL。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱<see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站</see> (機器翻譯)。這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱<see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站</see> (機器翻譯)。

trans-unit.source: The target URL of the image.
trans-unit.target: 影像的目標 URL。

trans-unit.source: If your application relies on cookieless sessions, or might receive requests from browsers that require cookieless sessions, using a tilde ("~") in a path can inadvertently result in creating a new session and potentially losing session data.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的應用程式依賴無 cookie 工作階段，或可能會收到要求從瀏覽器需要無 cookie 工作階段，使用波狀符號 ("~ 」) 之路徑中可能不小心會導致建立新的工作階段，可能遺失工作階段資料。

trans-unit.source: To set a property with a path such as ("~/path"), resolve the path using <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.ResolveUrl%2A>("~/path") before assigning it to the property.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定路徑的屬性，例如 ("~ / 路徑 」)，解析路徑使用<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.ResolveUrl%2A>("~ / 路徑 」) 之前指派給屬性。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents an optional event argument to be passed to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，代表傳遞至事件處理常式的選擇性事件引數。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Image" /> object of a postback event.
trans-unit.target: 通知 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Image" /> 物件有回傳事件。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱<see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站</see> (機器翻譯)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text displayed for a softkey when the Image has a <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Image.NavigateUrl" /> property defined.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定當影像具有定義的 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Image.NavigateUrl" /> 屬性時，螢幕鍵盤的顯示文字。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty <see langword="string" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是空的 <see langword="string" />。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱<see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站</see> (機器翻譯)。

trans-unit.source: The text displayed for a softkey when the image has a <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Image.NavigateUrl" /> property defined.
trans-unit.target: 當影像具有定義之 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Image.NavigateUrl" /> 屬性時，螢幕鍵盤的顯示文字。

trans-unit.source: This property is used only for devices that support softkeys.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性只適用於支援螢幕鍵盤的裝置。

trans-unit.source: If this property is empty, the `Text` property of the control is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性是空的`Text`使用控制項的屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the `Text` property is empty or its length is less than 9, the `Text` property is used for the softkey label.
trans-unit.target: 如果`Text`屬性是空的或它的長度小於 9`Text`屬性適用於螢幕鍵盤標籤。

trans-unit.source: Optional event argument to be passed to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 要傳遞至事件處理常式的選擇性事件引數。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler.RaisePostBackEvent(System.String)" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler.RaisePostBackEvent(System.String)" />。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱<see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站</see> (機器翻譯)。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Image> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Image> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。
